text: mariyu memu e pravaktanu pampina - allah anujnato - (prajalu) atanini anusarincalane pampamu. Mariyu okavela varu tamaku tamu an'yayam cesukunnappudu, ni vaddaku vacci varu allah yokka ksamabhiksa korinappudu - pravakta kuda varikai allah yokka ksamabhiksa koraku vedukunnappudu - varu allah nu niscayanga, ksamincevadu ganu mariyu karunapradata ganu pondutaru
